line_1: YOUR compliments, dear lady, pray forbear,
line_2: Old English services are more sincere;

line_1: Old English services are more sincere;
line_2: YOUR compliments, dear lady, pray forbear,

line_1: You send Ten Hearts, the tythe is only mine,
line_2: Give me but One, and burn the other Nine.
